document_data.name: Sandan's Sawmill
document_data.services: Stripped and sawed planks of wood
document_data.mainbody: '''Sandan's Sawmill''' was a lumber mill found in [[Archenbridge]] in late 14{{Th}} century [[DR]]. The mill was used to strip and saw timber felled from the nearby [[Arch Wood]]. It was powered by the strong currents of the [[River Arkhen]] that ran through the city, and under its eponymous bridge.
document_data.Owner: The mill was owned and operated by a former captain of the [[Archenriders]] named [[Sandan]],
